resources.string:
Viola finds herself in the middle of a forest. Looking around she sees a small cat sitting on a tree stump. A rotten log sits to her left, full of bugs and moss.

 "Hello," the cat says. "You're up and at 'em eh?"

 Viola searches her pockets and finds a letter. It reads:

 "I don't mind if you go to her house, but just stay away from the forest. Hope to see you home soon. 
-Dad"

 Viola walks over to the sign post in the middle of the grove. One sign points to the north with the description: ".....'s House". The other sign points south with the description: "Out of the Forest".
The path is blocked by a small patch of roses.

Viola looks around and finds the way is blocked by a startlingly huge patch of roses.\n\n There is a small path that leads through the woods to the left. Viola walks carefully through the foliage and finds an axe lodged in a tree.
